newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Josephthal picks six bank stocks.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Josephthal picks six bank stocks.

text.p: Josephthal, Lyon & Ross Inc analyst Frank Barkocy said Tuesday he selected six bank stocks as primary buy recommendations.

The stocks are BankBoston Corp, Fleet Financial Group Inc and PNC Bank Corp among large capitalization issues, and HUBCO Inc, Commercial Bankshares Inc and Poughkeepsie Financial Corp among small capitalization issues.
For the big caps, Barkocky's price targets are $91/shr for BankBoston, $$75/shr for Fleet and $52/shr for PNC. The stocks closed at 75-3/4, 64-5/8 and 43-9/16 respectively on Monday.
